outputs.name: hb_objs
outputs.description: The input honeybee objects with their boundary conditions edited.

inputs.name: _hb_objs
inputs.description:
Honeybee Faces or Rooms to which adiabatic boundary conditions
will be assigned.

inputs.name: exterior_walls_
inputs.description:
If True, all exterior walls of the input Rooms or Faces
will be set to adiabatic. This can also be a list of boolean values
and different adiabatic values will be assigned based on the cardinal
direction, starting with north and moving clockwise.

inputs.name: roofs_
inputs.description:
If True, all exterior roofs of the input Rooms or Faces will be
set to adiabatic.

inputs.name: exposed_floors_
inputs.description:
If True, all exposed floors of the input Rooms or Faces
will be set to adiabatic.

inputs.name: interior_walls_
inputs.description:
If True, all interior walls of the input Rooms or Faces
will be set to adiabatic.

inputs.name: interior_floors_
inputs.description:
If True, all interior floors and ceilings of the input
Rooms or Faces will be set to adiabatic.

name: HB Adiabatic by Type
description:
Make boundary conditions of Rooms or Faces adiabatic by face type.
